content: [TextBlock(text="Just got off a call with my friend from uni. He's diving into the world of NFTs and crypto trading. Makes me wonder if I should invest some time in learning about blockchain. Could be the future, right? #TechCurious #FutureOfFinance", type='text')]

[TextBlock(text="Just got off a call with my friend from uni. He's diving into the world of NFTs and crypto trading. Makes me wonder if I should invest some time in learning about blockchain. Could be the future, right? #TechCurious #FutureOfFinance", type='text')]

[TextBlock(text="I've decided to dive into some online courses about blockchain and smart contracts. It's a bit overwhelming, but also exciting to think about how this could shape not just finance, but art, ownership, and even identity in the future. #LearningCurve #TechExplorer", type='text')]
